mission.title: OUR MISSION
mission.paragraph1: New Health Society is revolutionizing corporate wellness by offering premium health services that improve employee wellbeing and company performance.
mission.paragraph2: We combine professional training techniques and personalized assessments with weekly team building experinces to create sustainable team health that in turn delivers measurable ROI for businesses of all sizes.

features.feature1: 1-on-1 training for optimal results and busy schedules
features.feature4: Custom nutrition & recovery plans for optimal performance
features.feature5: Private gym access for complete focus

features.feature1: Small-group training for companies focusing on team building and health
features.feature2: Maximum 1:6 personal trainer to participant ratio
features.feature4: Custom nutrition & recovery plans for optimal performance
features.feature5: Private gym access for complete focus - your gym, your music, your people, your vibe
features.feature6: Scheduling on availability during lunch time hours

slide1.title: GROUP ARRIVAL
slide1.text: Your journey begins with a personalized greeting from our dedicated staff, who will guide you through our state-of-the-art facility. Our team creates a welcoming atmosphere from the moment you arrive.

slide2.title: PREPARATION AND PARTNERING
slide2.text: Before diving into your wellness session, we ensure you're properly prepared with any necessary equipment and paired with the right trainer for your specific needs and goals.

slide3.title: COMPREHENSIVE TRAINING
slide3.text: Experience our signature training methodology that combines strength, mobility, and functional fitness. Our experts adapt each session to your company's unique needs and individual ability levels.

slide4.title: RECOVERY AND REFUEL
slide4.text: After your session, enjoy our dedicated recovery space to cool down and refuel with healthy refreshments. This important step ensures you return to work energized rather than exhausted.

location.subtext: We're excited to welcome you to New Health Society! Here's everything you need to find us easily and start your journey toward peak performance.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.parking: Plenty of parking spaces are available for stress-free visits.
accessibility.car: Easy to reach via Frankfurter Ring by car.
accessibility.publicTransport: Public transport-friendly with direct access via U6 (Studentenstadt).
accessibility.bike: Bike-friendly location with nearby racks for cyclists.
accessibility.tourText: Book a free tour today and experience your new gym in action. Fill out the Typeform below!
